Articles.Content:
Please cud anyone, create the TechTree editor. 

graphic UI

can edit tech tree node (create new node, create new conection, etc...)

can edit the parts in tech tree (move parts betwen tech tree node, parts condition (price), etc...) 

thanks for any reaction...

PS: CTT/SETI and others mod, is not the TechTree editor... ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

P.
